title: [Ta'Illistim, Peacock Couriers]
description: Dark blue tiles cover the floor of the spacious office, their hue matching those that line the single arch leading out of the building.  Pots of lush greenery are scattered about, contrasting with the darker decor.  A long marble counter divides the room in twain with a pierced mistwood screen resting atop.  Windows in the partition show the space beyond, which is lined with small, silver mailboxes, each one set with a tiny dial.
